CRD_SharRomance.synopsis: Shadowheart and the player wrestle with the nature of their romance, when it has already been stated that Shadowheart must dedicate herself to Shar, leaving no room for others in her life. She helps the player to interpret this in a manner that may let them bend the rules. Heavy on the flirtation and innuendo, as if to defect from less-romantic implications of their relationship status.Chronologically, this will occur after SH has committed to Shar by sacrificing Nightsong, but before the shar path sex scene that centres around a Nightfall ceremony.
CRD_SharRomance.how_to_trigger: 1. Have shadowheart as partner2. Be in act 33. Be on shar path4. Go to camp

CRD_ShadowCurse.synopsis: Shadowheart discovers that she has resistance to the shadow curse. She also suspects the presence of the shar temple and wants to look for it.
CRD_ShadowCurse.how_to_trigger: 1. Enter SCL2. Head out into SCL region without shadowheart3. Go to camp and talk to Shadowheart

CRD_SharedFuture.synopsis: Shadowheart is back in her 'home city' but doesn't really remember much of it. With the player's help/tag reactivity (baldurian inside info etc), they discuss a future they could have together. Forget the obstacles ahead for a while and dream of what post-victory life might be like (foreshadow romance fate)
CRD_SharedFuture.how_to_trigger: 1. Have shadowheart as partner2. Be in act 33. Be on enemy of shar path4. Go to camp

CRD_DefeatedParents.synopsis: Shadowheart confronts the player about the player killing her parents.
CRD_DefeatedParents.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to the grotto2. Kill shadowheart's parents while she is not there.3. Long rest4. Talk to Shadowheart

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance.synopsis: CRD for Shadowheart on the Enemy of Shar Path inviting the avatar to a romance scene. Shadowheart is feeling vulnerable after defying her goddess and being declared a heretic. She's now enemy to her former kin, and has been 'marked' (inflicted with so much pain by Shar that her her has partially turned white). Now she concorts a plan to restore some autonomy
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance.how_to_trigger: 1. Open origin debug book2. Select Nights3. Select "Act 3 Romance - Shar Path"

CRD_NightfallRomance.synopsis: CRD for Shadowheart on the Shar Path inviting the avatar to a romance scene. She wants help in conducting a nightfall ritual in order to win Shar's favour before they face the final battles.
CRD_NightfallRomance.how_to_trigger: 1. Open origin debug book2. Select Nights3. Select "Act 3 Romance - Shar Path"

CRD_SharRomance_50.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharRomance_50.text: Lady Shar's blessings be upon you.
CRD_SharRomance_50.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

CRD_SharRomance_26.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharRomance_26.text: What's that look you're giving me? I feel like a mouse cornered by a cat.
CRD_SharRomance_26.context: NodeContext: Tiny hint of wariness. Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

CRD_SharRomance_34.speaker: Player
CRD_SharRomance_34.text: You and me... it's an odd sort of love that we share. Help me understand it.

CRD_SharRomance_19.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharRomance_19.text: It can be difficult to explain, if you don't worship the Nightsinger yourself... but I'll try.
CRD_SharRomance_19.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

CRD_SharRomance_44.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharRomance_44.text: Lady Shar respects cunning. And that's exactly what you and I will need to demonstrate, if you want this to continue.
CRD_SharRomance_44.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

CRD_SharRomance_47.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharRomance_47.text: Rules are perhaps not always meant to be broken, but they are always intended to be bent. That kiss we shared wasn't my first, you know. Far from it.
CRD_SharRomance_47.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

CRD_SharRomance_22.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharRomance_22.text: Lady Shar's initiates... we weren't supposed to have relationships. Or flings. Not even stray trysts. And yet... we found a way.
CRD_SharRomance_22.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

CRD_SharRomance_42.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharRomance_42.text: You can frame many acts as service to the Dark Lady, if you put your mind to it. Seduction can be a worthy form of subterfuge. A snatched moment can practise the art of stealth.
CRD_SharRomance_42.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

CRD_SharRomance_5.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharRomance_5.text: And making a lover wait...? Well, there's few finer torments, if you know what you're doing...
CRD_SharRomance_5.context: NodeContext: Sly/knowing. Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

CRD_SharRomance_28.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharRomance_28.text: As long as my actions can be thought of as honouring Shar, or honing skills in her service... there is a great deal of flexibility to be had.
CRD_SharRomance_28.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

CRD_SharRomance_40.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharRomance_40.text: The catch is this: I can't truly love you. Not like most define it. I'll always have to keep a place for Lady Shar.
CRD_SharRomance_40.context: NodeContext: The serious bit - core issue that they face as a couple. Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

CRD_SharRomance_43.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharRomance_43.text: But you're clever, willing, and flexible... you needn't feel left wanting.
CRD_SharRomance_43.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

CRD_SharRomance_36.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharRomance_36.text: I'll give you all that I can. Just don't call it love.
CRD_SharRomance_36.context: NodeContext: 'That's the deal. Hope you like it' Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

CRD_SharRomance_31.speaker: Player
CRD_SharRomance_31.text: I really want to kiss you right now.

CRD_SharRomance_6.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharRomance_6.text: I know you do... but I'm not going to let you. Not just yet...
CRD_SharRomance_6.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

CRD_SharRomance_46.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharRomance_46.context: CinematicNodeContext: Leans forward slightly to whisper.NodeContext: Leans in slightly and whispers. Callback to something she just said moments earlier about making a lover wait. Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

CRD_SharRomance_41.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharRomance_41.text: Perhaps you do, but let's leave no doubt - I can't truly love you. Not like most define it. I'll always have to keep a place for Lady Shar.
CRD_SharRomance_41.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

CRD_SharRomance_0.speaker: Player
CRD_SharRomance_0.text: Honing skills? What do you mean?

CRD_SharRomance_51.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharRomance_51.text: Well... let's just say I can play the innocent when needed, have a lighter touch than you might expect, and can untie many knots with just my mouth. Practical skills, learned in service of Lady Shar.
CRD_SharRomance_51.context: NodeContext: Teasing. Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

CRD_SharRomance_29.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharRomance_29.text: But you need to understand the limitations. I can't truly love you. Not like most define it. I'll always have to keep a place for Lady Shar.
CRD_SharRomance_29.context: NodeContext: The serious bit - core issue that they face as a couple. Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

CRD_SharRomance_35.speaker: Player
CRD_SharRomance_35.text: I don't want to feel like some teenager, sneaking around.

CRD_SharRomance_4.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharRomance_4.text: Don't you? It might be more interesting than you realise...
CRD_SharRomance_4.context: NodeContext: Flirty. Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

CRD_SharRomance_8.speaker: Player
CRD_SharRomance_8.text: Is this where you tell me all about your former flames?

CRD_SharRomance_11.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharRomance_11.text: Don't worry. Even if I could remember them, none could withstand comparison to you.

CRD_SharRomance_1.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharRomance_1.text: I remember plenty - just not everything. I might not recall everything from my past, but I know my name. I can still walk and talk. I know words of devotion to Lady Shar and where to strike a leg in order to sever the main artery.
CRD_SharRomance_1.context: NodeContext: 'don't worry about the details' Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

CRD_SharRomance_21.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharRomance_21.text: Imagine how much of a chore I'd be to have around if I truly remembered nothing.
CRD_SharRomance_21.context: NodeContext: 'don't worry about the details' Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

CRD_SharRomance_25.speaker: Player
CRD_SharRomance_25.text: I can be very discreet. Shar won't know a thing.

CRD_SharRomance_33.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharRomance_33.text: Good. Then hopefully you'll understand exactly what I mean...
CRD_SharRomance_33.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

CRD_SharRomance_7.speaker: Player
CRD_SharRomance_7.text: As you mentioned Shar... is she truly going to prevent us from being together?

CRD_SharRomance_2.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharRomance_2.text: I don't know what to say... we're already together as much as Lady Shar allows. Is that not enough for you?
CRD_SharRomance_2.context: NodeContext: Conflicted - involved with the player but sworn to her goddess. Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

CRD_SharRomance_48.speaker: Player
CRD_SharRomance_48.text: If I can be with you, it is.

CRD_SharRomance_24.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharRomance_24.text: You can - if you understand how to reconcile certain... eccentricities in our relationship.
CRD_SharRomance_24.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

CRD_SharRomance_15.speaker: Player
CRD_SharRomance_15.text: I don't know. What do we even have?

CRD_SharRomance_18.speaker: Player
CRD_SharRomance_18.text: Perhaps not. This feels like a half-measure.

CRD_SharRomance_16.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharRomance_16.text: It's only a half-measure if you don't allow yourself to consider it otherwise.
CRD_SharRomance_16.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

CRD_SharRomance_23.speaker: Player
CRD_SharRomance_23.text: Don't worry - I won't paw at you.

CRD_SharRomance_13.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharRomance_13.context: NodeContext: Cheeky. Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

CRD_SharRomance_10.speaker: Player
CRD_SharRomance_10.text: In all seriousness, I want to talk about us. Help me understand exactly what you and I have - and what we don't.

CRD_SharRomance_17.speaker: Player
CRD_SharRomance_17.text: About Shar... she isn't truly going to prevent us from being together, is she?

CRD_ShadowCurse_14.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_ShadowCurse_14.text: This place... these shadows. I don't seem to be affected. Not as badly, anyway.

CRD_ShadowCurse_17.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_ShadowCurse_17.text: Perhaps I shouldn't put it to the test, but compared to everyone else, I feel fine. Better than fine.

CRD_ShadowCurse_4.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_ShadowCurse_4.text: This must mean she is protecting me - she favours me... and you don't even know what I mean, do you? Time to come clean I suppose.

CRD_ShadowCurse_22.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_ShadowCurse_22.text: I worship Shar, the Dark Lady, Mistress of the Night. Though honestly I'm surprised you didn't figure it out by yourself already...
CRD_ShadowCurse_22.context: NodeContext: Confessing a secret, but also slightly critical of the player's obliviousness

CRD_ShadowCurse_15.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_ShadowCurse_15.text: And this means I must have her blessing. Lady Shar is protecting me where others are left to face her wrath.

CRD_ShadowCurse_24.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_ShadowCurse_24.text: Do you know what this means? I must be blessed. Lady Shar is protecting me where others are left to face her wrath.

CRD_ShadowCurse_3.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_ShadowCurse_3.text: She loves me. She must do.

CRD_ShadowCurse_19.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_ShadowCurse_19.text: You're resourceful - you'll find a way. Don't give me that look. It's a good thing that I'm resistant to the shadows - this way I can help you.
CRD_ShadowCurse_19.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sceptical reaction from the player after SH's first line. Back to SH right after, looking defensive.NodeContext: A little defensive on the second sentence (reacting to player's displeased look)

CRD_ShadowCurse_27.speaker: Player
CRD_ShadowCurse_27.text: Don't get carried away - this could be something else.

CRD_ShadowCurse_13.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_ShadowCurse_13.text: Carried away? Hardly - the proof is right there. Just be grateful someone can handle this place.

CRD_ShadowCurse_5.speaker: Player
CRD_ShadowCurse_5.text: So what does all this mean?

CRD_ShadowCurse_9.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_ShadowCurse_9.text: Lady Shar wouldn't bless me like this for no reason - there must be something she wants of me.

CRD_ShadowCurse_26.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_ShadowCurse_26.text: Those signs we found, about Dark Justiciars... perhaps they were no coincidence. In either case, I need to watch for any place dedicated to Lady Shar. A temple, perhaps.

CRD_ShadowCurse_10.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_ShadowCurse_10.text: This isn't the first sign we've come across of a Sharran presence. I'm not sure I can keep ignoring them.

CRD_ShadowCurse_29.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_ShadowCurse_29.text: Have you ever heard of the Dark Justiciars? They were Lady Shar's most elite warriors. I can't explain why, but something about this reminds me of them.

CRD_ShadowCurse_23.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_ShadowCurse_23.text: I need to watch for any place dedicated to Lady Shar. A temple, perhaps. I need to know if there's more to this.

CRD_ShadowCurse_31.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_ShadowCurse_31.text: The Shadowfell, her domain, has power here. Whatever the Dark Lady needs of me, I'll wager the answer lies wherever her power is strongest. I need to find that place, and see what awaits me.

CRD_ShadowCurse_2.speaker: Player
CRD_ShadowCurse_2.text: Why you? I honour the Dark Lady, but the shadows do not spare me.

CRD_ShadowCurse_30.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_ShadowCurse_30.text: I... I don't know. I'm sorry. It's not for me to guess what value Lady Shar places on each servant.

CRD_ShadowCurse_1.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_ShadowCurse_1.text: Don't be concerned. Perhaps she'll present you with an opportunity to prove yourself. If I can find myself in her graces, you must have at least an equal chance.

CRD_ShadowCurse_20.speaker: Player
CRD_ShadowCurse_20.text: Your mistress rewards you with survival against her own corrupt power? That's not love.

CRD_ShadowCurse_18.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_ShadowCurse_18.text: The darkness is the truth, Selûnite. In the end, there will only be endless black, and those that Lady Shar has embraced.

CRD_ShadowCurse_28.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_ShadowCurse_28.text: Cling to your torches and memories of the sun if you like - see how long you last without me.

CRD_ShadowCurse_21.speaker: Player
CRD_ShadowCurse_21.text: First time I've been out of my element in the dark.

CRD_ShadowCurse_0.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_ShadowCurse_0.text: This is no cavern - this is true darkness. Perhaps Lady Shar will show you a path to her embrace, if you are worthy.

CRD_ShadowCurse_6.speaker: Player
CRD_ShadowCurse_6.text: You worship Shar? Why have you been keeping this from me?

CRD_ShadowCurse_12.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_ShadowCurse_12.text: Why? Safety, discretion, to keep us focused... need I go on?

CRD_ShadowCurse_16.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_ShadowCurse_16.text: In any case, we can talk about it later. It's the protection I have that matters right now.

CRD_SharedFuture_31.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharedFuture_31.text: Since we arrived in the city, I can't help but feel a little... anxious. But I'm not sure I know why.
CRD_SharedFuture_31.context: NodeContext: A little preoccupied. Arc: Rejected Shar path. SH has turned on her goddess. Future is unclear for her in a way that's a little daunting.

CRD_SharedFuture_10.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharedFuture_10.text: I don't think it's what happens if we fail that concerns me - we'll be beyond our worries at that point. I think what bothers me is what happens if we succeed...
CRD_SharedFuture_10.context: NodeContext: Arc: Rejected Shar path. SH has turned on her goddess. Future is unclear for her in a way that's a little daunting.

CRD_SharedFuture_6.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharedFuture_6.text: I've never been able to write my own future. I wouldn't even know where to begin.
CRD_SharedFuture_6.context: NodeContext: Arc: Rejected Shar path. SH has turned on her goddess. Future is unclear for her in a way that's a little daunting.

CRD_SharedFuture_15.speaker: Player
CRD_SharedFuture_15.text: It doesn't have to be a daunting prospect. Just dream about what you'd like.

CRD_SharedFuture_20.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharedFuture_20.text: I'd like to find somewhere peaceful, with my parents close by. Away from the city, perhaps.
CRD_SharedFuture_20.context: NodeContext: Dreaming of the future. (parents lived) Arc: Rejected Shar path. SH has turned on her goddess. Future is unclear for her in a way that's a little daunting.

CRD_SharedFuture_23.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharedFuture_23.text: I'd like room for animals. Lots of them - all shapes and sizes, so long as they appreciate a warm fire and more affection than they know what to do with.
CRD_SharedFuture_23.context: NodeContext: Dreaming of the future. Warming up to it. Arc: Rejected Shar path. SH has turned on her goddess. Future is unclear for her in a way that's a little daunting.

CRD_SharedFuture_1.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharedFuture_1.text: I want to grow flowers. I want to be surrounded by colours, every day. I'm tired of darkness.
CRD_SharedFuture_1.context: NodeContext: More impassioned. Definining what she wants from life. Arc: Rejected Shar path. SH has turned on her goddess. Future is unclear for her in a way that's a little daunting.

CRD_SharedFuture_4.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharedFuture_4.text: What more could I need? If I had all that, and I had you... that's more of a life that I ever dared to dream of.
CRD_SharedFuture_4.context: NodeContext: Arc: Rejected Shar path. SH has turned on her goddess. Future is unclear for her in a way that's a little daunting.

CRD_SharedFuture_29.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharedFuture_29.text: Yes... I want to share it all with you, if you're willing.
CRD_SharedFuture_29.context: NodeContext: Romantic/slightly nervous. Arc: Rejected Shar path. SH has turned on her goddess. Future is unclear for her in a way that's a little daunting.

CRD_SharedFuture_0.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharedFuture_0.text: Then sounds like I have everything I need - more of life than I'd ever imagined possible, without Shar.
CRD_SharedFuture_0.context: NodeContext: Romantic. Arc: Rejected Shar path. SH has turned on her goddess. Future is unclear for her in a way that's a little daunting.

CRD_SharedFuture_22.speaker: Player
CRD_SharedFuture_22.text: Let's see how we fare. Perhaps I'll get a better offer.

CRD_SharedFuture_28.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharedFuture_28.text: A better offer? You're lucky you're dashing and that I know you're joking.
CRD_SharedFuture_28.context: NodeContext: Mild, jokey annoyance. Arc: Rejected Shar path. SH has turned on her goddess. Future is unclear for her in a way that's a little daunting.

CRD_SharedFuture_7.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharedFuture_7.text: I was going to save the best until last, but to put your mind at ease - yes. I want to share everything that lies ahead of me with you. If you're willing, of course.
CRD_SharedFuture_7.context: NodeContext: Gently teasing. Arc: Rejected Shar path. SH has turned on her goddess. Future is unclear for her in a way that's a little daunting.

CRD_SharedFuture_13.speaker: Player
CRD_SharedFuture_13.text: There's nothing wrong with the city. You grew up here.

CRD_SharedFuture_39.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharedFuture_39.text: I did... after I was abducted. Perhaps if we survive all of this, a fresh start would be for the best.
CRD_SharedFuture_39.context: NodeContext: Arc: Rejected Shar path. SH has turned on her goddess. Future is unclear for her in a way that's a little daunting.

CRD_SharedFuture_3.speaker: Player
CRD_SharedFuture_3.text: Fair. What else do you have in mind?

CRD_SharedFuture_26.speaker: Player
CRD_SharedFuture_26.text: Is there room for me in this fresh start?

CRD_SharedFuture_37.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharedFuture_37.text: I'd like to find somewhere peaceful. Somewhere I can feel close to my parents' spirits. Away from the city, perhaps.
CRD_SharedFuture_37.context: NodeContext: Dreaming of the future (parents died) Arc: Rejected Shar path. SH has turned on her goddess. Future is unclear for her in a way that's a little daunting.

CRD_SharedFuture_32.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharedFuture_32.text: Well, I want to save my parents, of course. Take them away, far from Shar's influence. Someplace peaceful - away from the city, perhaps.
CRD_SharedFuture_32.context: NodeContext: Dreaming of  the future (parents known to be alive/not yet saved) Arc: Rejected Shar path. SH has turned on her goddess. Future is unclear for her in a way that's a little daunting.

CRD_SharedFuture_19.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharedFuture_19.text: I think I'd like to put Shar behind me, and find somewhere peaceful. Away from the city, perhaps.
CRD_SharedFuture_19.context: NodeContext: Dreaming  of the future (parents not yet known to be alive) Arc: Rejected Shar path. SH has turned on her goddess. Future is unclear for her in a way that's a little daunting.

CRD_SharedFuture_36.speaker: Player
CRD_SharedFuture_36.text: Start at the beginning. Imagine it's the day after we defeat Absolute. What then?

CRD_SharedFuture_11.speaker: Player
CRD_SharedFuture_11.text: Well, we've plenty to be anxious about. The tadpoles, the armies of the Absolute...

CRD_SharedFuture_33.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharedFuture_33.text: Thank you. Now I have plenty of specifics to worry about. That wasn't what I meant, though...

CRD_SharedFuture_30.speaker: Player
CRD_SharedFuture_30.text: I know, just teasing. Tell me what's on your mind.

CRD_SharedFuture_8.speaker: Player
CRD_SharedFuture_8.text: That's not even all - there's the githyanki to consider, whatever Raphael is cooking up, the refugee crisis...

CRD_SharedFuture_14.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SharedFuture_14.text: Please stop reminding me of things to worry about. I'd like to get some sleep tonight.
CRD_SharedFuture_14.context: NodeContext: Mild annoyance at the player's joking list of things to worry about.

CRD_DefeatedParents_0.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_DefeatedParents_0.text: I was so close to receiving Lady Shar's embrace, at last. One final test was all that remained - but you ruined that for me.
CRD_DefeatedParents_0.context: NodeContext: Outraged. The player killed a sacrifice intended for Shadowheart (her parents, though she doesn't know it). Shadowheart had remained loyal to Shar, but the player spoiled her chance to prove herself.

CRD_DefeatedParents_3.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_DefeatedParents_3.text: I cannot remain with you. Count yourself lucky that I do not just cut you down in the Nightsinger's name.
CRD_DefeatedParents_3.context: NodeContext: Outraged. The player killed a sacrifice intended for Shadowheart (her parents, though she doesn't know it). Shadowheart had remained loyal to Shar, but the player spoiled her chance to prove herself.

CRD_DefeatedParents_2.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_DefeatedParents_2.text: I know what you did. My parents - I felt everything they did... as you killed them.
CRD_DefeatedParents_2.context: NodeContext: Devastated, angry. The player killed her parents when she was not present (Shadowheart had abandoned Shar and sought to free her parents)

CRD_DefeatedParents_1.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_DefeatedParents_1.text: They were all I had left, and you stole them from me. You're not even worth killing.
CRD_DefeatedParents_1.context: NodeContext: Devastated, angry. The player killed her parents when she was not present (Shadowheart had abandoned Shar and sought to free her parents)

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_32.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_32.text: I can still feel the Shadowfell all over me... still hear her words in my ear. I feel... unclean.

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_4.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_4.text: You've nothing to be sorry for. Far from it, in fact. Without your help, things could have ended very differently for me.

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_5.speaker: Player
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_5.text: You mean Shar? Forget it - her spite can't hurt you now.

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_3.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_3.text: I hope that's true, but I'm not so sure. She has a far reach, and a long memory.

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_21.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_21.text: I have an idea. Something I've wanted to do for a while. Something that might help me put her in the past... but I'll need your help.

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_18.speaker: Player
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_18.text: So what do you want to do about it?

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_30.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_30.text: I want to wash it away. All of it...

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_17.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_17.text: I have an idea, but I'll need your help.

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_26.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_26.text: Wait until the others are asleep, then come with me. There's a place we can go, down the coast a little.

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_35.speaker: Player
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_35.text: What do I need to do?

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_31.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_31.text: Just wait until the others are asleep, then come with me. There's a place we can go, down the coast a little.

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_15.speaker: Player
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_15.text: If that's what you want, I'll be ready.

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_23.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_23.text: Good. Until then. Get some rest while you can.

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_39.speaker: Player
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_39.text: But what then? Come on, let's not start keeping secrets again.

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_44.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_44.text: Do you remember what I told you before, about how I can't swim? Well, I think it's time I remedied that. And washed off Shar's bile at the same time.

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_12.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_12.text: Well... don't laugh, but one thing I do remember about myself is that I can't swim. I think it's time I remedied that. And washed off Shar's bile at the same time.

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_8.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_8.text: I need to take back control. Seize what I've been denied.

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_9.speaker: Player
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_9.text: You want to go swimming? I was expecting something dangerous.

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_14.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_14.text: You wouldn't say that if you ever saw me in the water.

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_20.speaker: Player
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_20.text: I'm no swimming teacher, just so you're aware.

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_29.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_29.text: Understood. Just keep me from drowning, and don't laugh while I flail about in waist-high water. That's all I ask.

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_6.speaker: Player
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_6.text: Shar? Not Lady Shar? Once you'd have bitten your own tongue rather than speak like that.

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_13.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_13.text: A lot's changed since then. More than I ever thought was possible. And besides, she's no lady.

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_7.speaker: Player
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_7.text: You blaspheme. I ought to kill you for that.

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_37.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_37.text: Strictly speaking you should have killed me the moment Shar banished me. But you didn't, for whatever reason. Help me, or don't.

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_2.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_2.text: I seem to recall you encouraging me to spare Nightsong. Perhaps you're more like me than you care to admit. Help me, or don't.

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_27.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_27.text: I sacrificed my memory's for Shar- to preserve my mission. But one thing I do remember about myself is that I can't swim. I think it's time I remedied that. And washed off Shar's bile at the same time.

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_16.speaker: Player
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_16.text: Down the coast? Are we going fishing?

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_0.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_0.text: Not quite. You'll see when we get there.

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_45.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_45.text: I had thought you would want to make time for me... I suppose I was wrong. Rest well then.

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_34.speaker: Player
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_34.text: No. This is no time for distractions - we need to keep focused.

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_11.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_11.text: I see. In that case you'd better go get some rest. Wouldn't want your focus to slip.

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_36.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_36.text: I did, and its too late for regrets... but I wish I felt a little more comfortable in my own skin.

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_38.speaker: Player
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_38.text: Do you expect sympathy from me? You turned your back on the Dark Lady.

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_40.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_40.text: Don't be so quick to judge - she didn't ask anything of you. Who's to say you'd have handled it any differently?
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_40.context: NodeContext: Bitter. The player's being unsympathetic.

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_10.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_10.context: NodeContext: Bitter. The player's being hypocritical.

CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_41.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance_41.text: What's done is done, but I have an idea that might help me... if you're willing to play a part.

CRD_NightfallRomance_25.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_NightfallRomance_25.text: A beautiful night. Not even a hint of moon to sully Lady Shar's dark sky.
CRD_NightfallRomance_25.context: CinematicNodeContext: Note - SH should not look up at a night sky as it can't be presumed it's visible at this moment. She's just talking in general.NodeContext: Note - SH should not look up at a night sky as it can't be presumed it's visible at this moment. She's just talking in general.

CRD_NightfallRomance_2.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_NightfallRomance_2.text: Allow me to be frank - we can't presume we'll get to share another night like this; there's a battle coming. Not everyone is going to make it.

CRD_NightfallRomance_29.speaker: Player
CRD_NightfallRomance_29.text: We've made it this far. Have a little faith.

CRD_NightfallRomance_24.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_NightfallRomance_24.text: Faith is one thing I have in plentiful supply. In fact, it's what I wanted to talk to you about.

CRD_NightfallRomance_9.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_NightfallRomance_9.text: Not fatalistic - pragmatic. We should do everything we can to tilt the odds in our favour. That's what I wanted to talk to you about.

CRD_NightfallRomance_7.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_NightfallRomance_7.text: We should make an offering to Lady Shar, to seek her blessing and protection against what lies ahead. A Nightfall ritual.

CRD_NightfallRomance_13.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_NightfallRomance_13.text: Lady Shar's followers honour her with an act of wickedness, carried out in her name. Then, they feast, knowing they carry the Nightsinger's blessing anew.

CRD_NightfallRomance_8.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_NightfallRomance_8.text: Help me do this. You will not regret it.

CRD_NightfallRomance_23.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_NightfallRomance_23.text: Wait until the others are asleep, then come with me. It might just save your life...

CRD_NightfallRomance_20.speaker: Player
CRD_NightfallRomance_20.text: If I don't have much time left I'd rather spend it enjoying myself than praying.

CRD_NightfallRomance_28.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_NightfallRomance_28.text: We can leave the kneeling and praying to the rest. The Nightsinger prefers a more active form of devotion. An act of wickedness, carried out in her name, followed by a feast.

CRD_NightfallRomance_4.speaker: Player
CRD_NightfallRomance_4.text: I thought we were finished, you and I.

CRD_NightfallRomance_10.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_NightfallRomance_10.text: We are finished. But that doesn't mean I don't have uses for you... and perhaps you for me.

CRD_NightfallRomance_6.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_NightfallRomance_6.text: Lady Shar demands my heart, and I give it to her freely. But there's more to me than a heart, and I'd like to indulge you. Just this once.
CRD_NightfallRomance_6.context: CinematicNodeContext: Leans in slightly for 'just this once'NodeContext: Leans in slightly and whispers 'just this once' sotto voce. Maximum flirtation.

CRD_NightfallRomance_18.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_NightfallRomance_18.text: Do I truly need to explain? You made me who I am. Now I'd like to show you the fruits of your labour.

CRD_NightfallRomance_5.speaker: Player
CRD_NightfallRomance_5.text: You expect me to participate in some Sharran ritual? Clearly you don't know me well.

CRD_NightfallRomance_27.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_NightfallRomance_27.text: I know you perfectly. You helped usher me into being who I am. Indulge your darker side - with me.

CRD_NightfallRomance_3.speaker: Player
CRD_NightfallRomance_3.text: A Nightfall ritual - an act of wickedness and decadence in Lady Shar's name?

CRD_NightfallRomance_15.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_NightfallRomance_15.text: Precisely. Care to show your devotion? Just say the word.

CRD_NightfallRomance_30.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_NightfallRomance_30.text: Your loss then. If you're struck down in the battles to come, remember that you refused Lady Shar's shield.

CRD_NightfallRomance_11.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_NightfallRomance_11.text: And my... company. But no matter; there's willing flesh elsewhere. Sleep well, if you can.

CRD_NightfallRomance_17.speaker: Player
CRD_NightfallRomance_17.text: I suppose you might be right.

CRD_NightfallRomance_12.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_NightfallRomance_12.text: I'm glad you feel the same. We should do everything we can to tilt the odds in our favour. That's what I wanted to talk to you about.
